alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 04 at 2:33AM CDT until September 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR BREEZY WINDS, LOW RH, AND DRY FUELS FOR PARTS OF WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND WESTERN NORTH TEXAS... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 9 PM CDT this evening. * WINDS...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts over 35 mph possible. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 16 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Up to 105. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended. * SEVERITY... FUELS (ERC)...90th+ percentile...5 (out of 5). WEATHER...Near Critical...2 (out of 5). FIRE ENVIRONMENT...7 (out of 10).
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Archer; Baylor; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger
